title: Duellist's Prerogative
content:
nge to Duel: Challenge an enemy to attack only you, inflicting Bleeding on the target. (Compelled to Duel Condition: Has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against anyone but the caster. Might start Bleeding if struck by the Dueller.)

Dueller's Enthusiasm: While you are not dual-wielding, you can make an additional melee attack with The Dueller.

Weapon Enchantment +3.

BG3 Duellist's Prerogative Location & Where to Find

Location: Lower City Quest: Save Vanra (Quest Reward. Acquired in Flaming Fist
